overview.challenge: AKM Secure entered a market dominated by defense contractors like Palantir and Anduril. Their revolutionary cryptographic key management technology was powerful but too complex for non-technical decision makers to understand. They needed to transform their entire digital presence to compete at the enterprise level.
overview.solution: We conducted rapid user research with 20+ CISOs and security professionals to understand their decision-making process. Then we transformed complex cryptographic concepts into intuitive visualizations, created interactive product demos, and built a responsive platform that works flawlessly across all devices. Every design decision was made to reduce cognitive load while maintaining enterprise-grade sophistication.
overview.impact: Within 30 days of launch, AKM Secure saw a 400% increase in qualified demo requests. Mobile engagement increased by 85%, with enterprise visitors spending 3x more time exploring the platform. The new design positioned them as a serious competitor in the enterprise security space, leading to meetings with Fortune 500 companies.

learnings.title: Simplify Without Dumbing Down
learnings.insight: Enterprise buyers are sophisticated but time-poor. They need complex information presented clearly, not simplified to the point of losing credibility.

learnings.title: Mobile Matters for B2B
learnings.insight: 85% of our C-suite visitors first visited on mobile devices, often during commutes or between meetings.

learnings.title: Speed Builds Trust
learnings.insight: Page load speed directly correlated with conversion rates. Every 100ms improvement increased conversions by 2%.

testimonials.quote: The new design immediately positioned us as a serious enterprise player. We went from struggling to get meetings to having Fortune 500 companies reaching out to us.
